website_summaries.verdict: This hammer holster is well-made and designed to sit a little higher on the hip than some other holsters.
pros: Stitching and riveting are of high quality
Design keeps the hammer from banging against your knee while you work
cons: If your belt is thin, this hammer holster may be a bit wide to meet your needs

customer_reviews.title: Need slight alteration for tool belts thinner than 3 1/2in
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Problem is I use a 2" tool belt and over the course of the day the holder would roll up to bottom rivets and hang awkwardly. The space for a belt is 3 1/2" from inside top to bottom rivets, so I put two of my own rivets in 2 1/8" down and fixed the problem. Now holder no longer rolls up and if I ever get a thicker tool belt I'll just drill out the rivets. This holder should last a long time and is made of 1/8 thick leather just folded over to 1/4" thickness on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Soop

customer_reviews.title: Best hammer holder in the known universe.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hammer holder I've ever used. The advantage of having a high mount hammer holder in my profession, since I work at heights, is priceless. First of all, it doesn't allow my hammer handle to bang against my knee and thigh all day. Second when I bend down or work on my knees, the hammer can't get pushed up and out of the holder. Also, quality craftsmanship, and quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Justin roman

customer_reviews.title: Good holder
customer_reviews.text: I've been worried Occidental leather belts for years in my profession as a carpenter. I had gotten frustrated with an old McGuire Nicholas Hammer holder because it was not easy to slide that handle of the hammer in the loop. I purchased this Occidental leather high hammer holder not knowing if it would work for me. Some of the reviews indicated that it was difficult to use and they recommended the hammer holder that hangs lower. I have not found it could be a problem and I would recommend this to someone else. It is made with typical Occidental leather quality and I imagine it will last me for several decades.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder could use a couple rivets higher well made
customer_reviews.text: I like this holder well made good leather nicely riveted. I use estwing big blue which is 2" longer than other hammers and this holder was shorter so it hold the hammer up higher which is nice. My only complaint is it wouldn't stay flat so it would roll I put 2 rivets in it bbn to stiffen it 2 1/4" down to accommodate a 2" belt not it's worth a 5 star review if they did it factory.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: for people that crawl and crouch alot.
customer_reviews.text: i like this holder better than the standard one. i crawl around in tight spaces alot and find the low dangling hammer gets pushed up alot and gets in the way. this holds it higher and out of the way. i also think the belt loop is a better and more durable belt attachment than the slots on the standard one, i never liked that type.
customer_reviews.author: diamond dogs

customer_reviews.title: Finally got lucky with Occidental's 3 products
customer_reviews.text: Like the 5037 tape holder and 5589 tool pouch, I am so so glad I found and spent my money with Occidental Leather. And, it is becoming harder and harder to know what to believe when reading manufacturer's reviews. Unless stolen, I know I will never need to replace these products. The leather is not stiff, stitching/riveting are also quality. I never wear nylon when I can wear leather. And like shoes, leather gets more comfortable with time and use. However, if you like to eat the cheapest food and see the lowest price Doctors, you won't appreciate the craftsmanship here.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Occidental the top-of-the-line tool belt fits comfortably heavy duty Construction but very soft and supple does not cut into me and just much more pleasurable to wear over longer periods of time not like the cheap crap you get at the Blue store or the orange store
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Yep it rolls
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my harness and always try to good care of my gear last weekend I used some leather oil and got it soft and broken in. Now the problem is I use a 2 inch belt and a 3 won't fit my harness loops and as others have said it rolls over. I'll either rivet it like suggested or get the clip on version with a 2 1/2 inch clip.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: high mount is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pro trim carpenter and wear my 12 inch soft face hammer behind my right side tool pouch. With my previous low mount holder my hammer was constantly getting dislodged while squatting and on my knees running baseboard. With this high mount my hammer handle rarely touches the floor. Took a day to get used to it, but now i ring the holder without thought.
customer_reviews.author: tony p.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality as always with Occidental products. Nuce to have when I don't want to carry my entire belt but I also put it on my belt as I like to keep my hammer higher sometimes to avoid the handle bumping into things...
customer_reviews.author: JLM in AK

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: wanted a hammer clip that would keep my hammer higher on my side, rather than banging into my leg all the time. I work industrial sites, this works well for me. Good quality and sturdy. Will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: American made swag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, run it on back of rig. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth every dime.
customer_reviews.text: Great; as with any OL product. Actually picked up this attachment not for my hammer but to carry my tin snips and it does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe M

customer_reviews.title: Hammer holder
customer_reviews.text: My Estwing framing hammer doesn't slap me on the back of my leg like the original does. Harder to remove and put back in because of riding higher on my belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Haskell

customer_reviews.title: It's Occidental, what more needs said.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'3" female carpenter, framer. So I like that this holds my hammer high and keeps my 26 ounce hammer from banging on the back of my calf all day. Of course you can't beat Occidentals quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well built.
customer_reviews.text: This sits higher and swings less than the alternate Occidental hammer holder. I haven't had any issue with ease of holstering my hammer. It's a sturdy leather piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: High quality leather, very sturdy and well built. One may be able to get a hammer holder for cheaper but no where even close to the durability and quality this is not a stamped out piece of what seems to be cardboard and possibly not even leather that you can get a big box store. And even aside from the durability you can tell the craftsmanship that are put into these just by looking at them, and they're made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: Love it , hammer doesn’t hit leg as much now
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best hammer holster
customer_reviews.text: Hammer sits high on hip so it is not banging into leg on every step
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Savoca

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this leather it’s tough and it does its job, although I wish there were different shades. I also love how it’s not to low like other ones since I have a big hammer.
customer_reviews.author: tristian salinas

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wear mine in the center of my back on a 3" belt. The rigidity of the high mount makes it easier to re-holster, provides greater comfort and safety as there is less likelihood of my hammer being pushed up out of the holder after crouching down. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, US made product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, US made product. It seats high on your tool belt minimizing hammer wobble. As always, Occidental is expensive, but well worth it's quality, functionality, and longevity for the serious tradesman.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Union carpenter of 22 yrs. have purchased two, one for interior finish bags another for concrete bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Way better that the low hanging back of leg hitter.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had used the DEWALT D5124 Heavy Duty Ballistic Nylon Hammer Holder for years and I liked it. I wear my hammer in the back and it let my hammer bang around on my legs, though. The Occidental Leather High Mount doesn't let my hammer do that. It sounds small, but it's really nice not having my hammer banging around on my legs all day! Buy one, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: M1903

customer_reviews.title: Quality made belt but the sizing is off like really bad
customer_reviews.text: Quality made belt but the sizing is off like really bad. I need something with a 34” midpoint and I bought a medium with a 37 inch mid point and I can’t even hardly buckle up to the first hole which is sad because I figured the 37”midpoint would allow for extra layers in winter
customer_reviews.author: Chris Canet

customer_reviews.title: HIGH MOUNT HAMMER HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: Made from thicker leather than other brands. Since it mounts higher than others the hammer handle is not banging your knee. If you carried a pistol would you want it flopping around on your leg or secured to your waist? The HIGH MOUNT HAMMER HOLDER is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Occidental manufactures the best tool belts, bags, etc. Been using them for 30+ years. Nothing else comes close.
customer_reviews.author: copper 1795

customer_reviews.title: Best hammar holder
customer_reviews.text: Best hammar holder. Period. Hammer stays put right at your side, or right behind you without swinging all over the place, banging into your leg when you walk. Thick leather, high quality craftsmanship. As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the high back to everyone. i used the low mount that came with the bags for 14 years and it finally gave out and i switch I wish I did a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son in law for Christmas and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvinlife

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the belt loop is too large for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the belt loop is too large for a regular belt This is made for a 3" belt. I had to measure for my belt and pop two rivets into it so it would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Hammer holders should have two cuts in them to secure them to your belt. This will fold or have slack not keeping the hammer in one place
customer_reviews.author: gregg spain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold taping knives believe it or not, this is to hold my 10 - 12" knives at the same time behind me at the ready. I used to use the regular hammer loop but like with hammers, they bang the back leg and although my knives don't bang my back leg the knife handles bang my butt lol. This hammer holster fixed all that! Built tough in America with QUALITY, and looks really nice with my occidental pouch and belt, now that I know it works good I might have to buy one for my framing pouch set up. Oh for reference this hammer loop is on a occidental 3" belt
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is pretty comfortable compared to my Home Depot Husky Hammer Holder
customer_reviews.author: Hector Avila

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, I'd expect nothing less from Occidental. Love this company
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than the flap
customer_reviews.text: First time using the high mount. I like it better than the flap.
customer_reviews.author: anthony d.

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Wont slap your leg all day
customer_reviews.text: Works great and worth every penny. Fixes the hammer slapping against your leg a million times a day problem! Which will save you in the long run. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I look like a tough guy carpenter with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is the pride of my kit. Compliments my Occidental Tape Holder.

customer_reviews.title: the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, durable and made in USA....shall I say more?...Well, it does prevent a long handle hammer from impacting the side of your knee or joint on you leg......
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter man

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have been using it every day, for over a year.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Occidental product!
customer_reviews.text: Occidental gear is by far the leader in the industry!

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It makes it easy to remove & replace hammer. Works GREAT!!!!! Love it!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Matches pouch
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this since my el cheapo didn't match my Occidental pouch
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hammer from slapping the back of my knees! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy on belt not well secured but works good
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a professional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an dad on for my belt. This keeps my framing hammer from tapping my knees all day. Nice having it sit up high on the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Hahahaha123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your hammer from banging into your legs every other step.
customer_reviews.author: Grasshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is top notch. However, my preference would be to go with the lower mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Role

customer_reviews.title: Great American made product
customer_reviews.text: Love occidentals products I use a 20oz estwing and doesn't hit my knee when walking and American made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say on a product like this. It's put together well and does the job, and looks good doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Would be great when used in the right context
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to put directly at the back of my belt for my hammer tacker when roofing. I thought the high mount would be preferable to keep me from sitting on the tool but it also makes it difficult to quickly get the tool in and out of. Would be better for use on the side where it is more accessible. Other than that it is very durable and well-constructed. I definitely recommend it if looking for a different side hammer loop or something.
customer_reviews.author: wildman

customer_reviews.title: Again Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, really heavy duty, easily fit occidentals 3" ranger belt, and matches it too.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Occidental Hammer Holder
customer_reviews.text: High mount design keeps hammer free, unlike the low swing mounts. The holder is well designed and manufactured. Rugged and I have had it in use for approximately one month. Nothing on the market like it for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G. Youngsr

customer_reviews.title: OL that's it! !!
customer_reviews.text: Im a carpenter works great for my hammer and me
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Good USA made....not so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice product... Very pleased with the holder. Should last for many years .... Now that I've used for awhile I don not recommended this product.. it has ruined all of my pants. It leaves a big red stain right where it sits on the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Teger

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: im a roofer and i wanted somthing that would keep my tools from hitting my knees. this did just that. im impressed and happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: james brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great to have a high hammer holder
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described,Original genuine occi leather. Great to have a high hammer holder,it prevents the hammer from hitting my legs.Great service and fast shipping..A+++
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: QUICK DRAW LIVES!
customer_reviews.text: HIGH MOUNT DESIGN DOES A GOOD JOB OF KEEPING YOUR HAMMER FROM CONSTANTLY "SPANKING" YOU. SOME GUYS LIKE THAT THOUGH... SORRY, COULDN'T RESIST -- I REALLY WISH I'D FOUND THESE THINGS SOONER!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Tough not cheep
customer_reviews.text: I've had cheep hammer loop before this isn't one of them. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good mount, bet pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of having a high mount instead of having the regular mount and in this case it works really well, hammer never on your way, and it always under your hand. The only thing is it pricey ( 4 stars for the price). Other than that great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Another great product by Occidental
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by Occidental. Their quality and workmanship is second to none, not to mention it is all made here in the good ole US of A!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a framer or trim carpenter. Fits tight against belt, which makes it easy to grab hammer from behind. Has little to no sag.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Holder
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The hammer holder doesn't allow a hammer to whack the back of your legs when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Chas D. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Now I have the best hammer loop I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: 20 + years pounding nails and now I have the best hammer loop I've ever had. Don't think twice about it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Stumpy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very sturdy. My only complaint is this holder has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very sturdy. My only complaint is this holder has a tendency to roll under with the weight of a 20 ounce hammer. So I catch myself reaching back often to reorient it.
customer_reviews.author: Albert B Jones III

product_meta.title: Occidental Leather 5059 High Mount Hammer Holder
product_meta.description: Color:MulticolorOccidental Leather has set the industry standard for customer loyalty and design excellence with superior field function for over 34 years. The intuitive designs and hand specific tool holder organizers improve working rhythm on the job.
feature_bullets: The Product Is Good To Use
